titles.title: Great Is The Lord And Most Worthy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
GREAT IS THE LORD, AND MOST WORTHY
OF PRAISE,
THE CITY OF OUR GOD,
THE HOLY PLACE,
THE JOY OF THE WHOLE EARTH.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
GREAT IS THE LORD WITH WHOM
WE HAVE THE VICTORY.
HE AIDS US AGAINST THE ENEMY
WE BOW DOWN ON OUR KNEES.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
AND LORD, WE WANT TO
LIFT YOUR NAME UP HIGH.
AND LORD, WE WANT TO THANK YOU
FOR THE WORK YOU'VE
DONE IN OUR LIVES.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
AND LORD, WE TRUST
IN YOUR UNFAILING LOVE,
FOR YOU ALONE ARE GOD ETERNAL
THROUGHOUT EARTH
AND HEAVEN ABOVE.
